tool.help:
================================================ Calculates biodiversity indicators and maps them ================================================
**What it does**
This tool alculates the number of records, species richness, Simpson index, Shannon index, Hurlbert index (n = 50), and Hill numbers for each cell.
**Input description**
A tabular file with observation data. Must at least contain three columns temporal referential (year, date, ...), numerical factor.
+----------+ | CRS | +==========+ | crs | +----------+ | ... | +----------+
**Output**
A text output that summarizes in a tabular the results of all the indicators.
Multiple PNG files representing the indicators on a map (according to the choice of map made).
